title: Slow Client Upgrade Download
body:
I downloaded the game and its now upgrading the client, it's only going at ~131 KBps when I can download DOTA 2 at ~1.2 MBps in steam

P2P transfer is off, I've tried running as admin, using the different launchers (lol.launcher.exe and lol.launcher.admin.exe) with and without admin

No matter what I do I can't seem to increase the download speed... any suggestions would be appreciated!

replies.body: League downloads directly through our patching server, so no P2P should be involved.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case your network is having trouble specifically reaching our services.  Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can also help with auto-adjusting firewall settings in case that's the culprit.
